comment:
Distance: 1202 Conditions: Down Stream, Moderate Rain and no wind. Stake boat starts Comments: In the Boys 2nd boat 4’s event. Middletown was in the lead until veered way off course and almost hit land. Had to stop readjust and then continued to race.
Thank you to Middletown, Lewis Mills, and Avon for coming to the Middle of the Farmington. It was raced on our new and improved 1202 meter stake boat course

None
regatta_display_name: NEIRA Boys & Girls Fours,Middle of Farmington: Avon, Lewis Mills, Middletown
